com.syclo.tool
Class ToolUser

java.lang.Object
  com.syclo.agentry.internal.AgentryManagedObject
      com.syclo.agentry.internal.AgentryJavaBackEndManagedObject
          com.syclo.agentry.User
              com.syclo.tool.ToolUser

public class ToolUser
extends com.syclo.agentry.User

This class extends com.syclo.agentry.User. Since the Agentry.User class is implemented with very limited functionality, ToolUser is responsible for actually managing the connection/disconnection to the BackEnd server, and processing the Agentry session variables for fetches, pushes and transaction. The class writes out logging information to a file called server.{username}.log
